class.name: MMMixSynchronizer
class.brief_description: A [MMSynchronizer] that synchronizes the character and skeleton's position and facing direction as a blend between root motion and character motion.

members.member: The amount of root motion to apply to the character. A value of 0 means the character will follow its trajectory exactly, while a value of 1 means the character will follow the root motion exactly. Values between 0 and 1 will blend between the two.
